Text: This isn't the soundtrack, this is the score. I mean, it's very nice still, but the title of the download is completely misleading.
something wrong is with the quality - it doesn't have such power like in movie or it's not clear enough... hm...
quality is fine. songs seem to be arranged a bit differently than when heard in the movie. Still, a very good soundtrack. Thx locobot12

Musical arrangements within the OST songs are a little different than what u hear in the movie.

Still a good OST for what it is!

Thx locobot12 for the UP.
Any chance of a FLAC or otherwise lossless version ripped from the original source?  Thanks for your efforts.
